Articles.Content:
Hi there fellow Kerbonauts.

I started playing this awesome game for 2 weeks, mostly building rockets in VAB. Recently building planes with a lot more trial-and-error than rockets ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

But after reading tutorials, I getting a hang of it. So here you go, StrutKa 1 Light Attack Plane, armed with bombs, missiles, and cannons. It flies quite easily, with short take off run, decent speed and manuverability.

Here is some pictures:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/bBfk3)

Download link for .craft file: [https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8HoChXPmKpreWZHWjJpZGxadWM/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B8HoChXPmKpreWZHWjJpZGxadWM/view?usp=sharing)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-24T12:04:56Z" title="03/24/2015 12:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 24, 2015</time> by Theblekedet**
Thanks. I inspired by Ju 87 inverted gull wings
